name: Dark www.CarSales.com.au
description:
A dark theme for www.carsales.com.au.

- Dark, but not too dark!
- Easy to read font on a dark background.
- Great in both dark and lit environments.
- Works well with uBlock
additional_info:
Update - 15/06/2018
  • Fixed page navigation colours
Update - 18/05/2018
  • Fixed postcode background colour in advanced search
Update - 2/11/2017
  • Fixed accordion menu in vehicle specifications and features
Launch - 31/10/2017
